languages.text: {n}Лидеры заговора, культисты Последнего восхода, были настигнуты в шахтах. Они окружили странный ксенообелиск из темного материала, покрытый глифами, и пытались пробудить его ото сна. Рисунки на нем были схожи с теми, что чертили обезумевшие каторжники. Чудовищная конструкция полнилась энергией, способной разорвать на части планету. Героически нарушив план культистов, надзиратели вызвали сбой в работе страшной машины, и вместо взрыва обелиск испустил волну жара, что сплавила его и обратила в пепел окружающих. Веабос-6 был спасен.{/n}

{n}The leaders of the conspiracy, the cultists of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лидеры заговора, культисты Последнего восхода, были настигнуты в шахтах. Они окружили странный ксенообелиск из темного материала, покрытый глифами, и пытались пробудить его ото сна. Рисунки на нем были схожи с теми, что чертили обезумевшие каторжники. Чудовищная конструкция полнилась энергией, способной разорвать на части планету. Героически нарушив план культистов, надзиратели вызвали сбой в работе страшной машины, и вместо взрыва обелиск испустил волну жара, что сплавила его и обратила в пепел окружающих. Веабос-6 был спасен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists of the Cult of the Final Dawn, have been trapped up in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, and have tried to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts have been drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the plan of the cultists, the guards have caused the terrible machine to fail, and the obelisk had emitted a heatwave, that melted it and turned those around it into ashes, instead of exploding. Vheabos-VI had been saved.{/n}

{n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists of the Cult of the Final Dawn, have been trapped up in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, and have tried to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts have been drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the plan of the cultists, the guards have caused the terrible machine to fail, and the obelisk had emitted a heatwave, that melted it and turned those around it into ashes, instead of exploding. Vheabos-VI had been saved.{/n}

{n}The leaders of the conspiracy, the cultists of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这场阴谋的罪魁祸首，那些终末黎明的邪教徒被困在了矿井里。他们围在了覆盖着象形文字的黑色异形方尖碑周围，试图将它从沉睡中唤醒。这座方尖碑上的象形文字和那些发疯囚犯的涂鸦很像，蕴含着足以撕裂行星的能量。行星的看守英勇地破坏了邪教徒的计划，也破坏了那座可怕的方尖碑。方尖碑没有爆炸，而是释放出炽热的热浪，方尖碑本身在热浪中熔化了，周围的一切也被烧成了灰烬，但维博斯六号星终于安全了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists from the Cult of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这场阴谋的罪魁祸首，那些终末黎明的邪教徒被困在了矿井里。他们围在了覆盖着象形文字的黑色异形方尖碑周围，试图将它从沉睡中唤醒。这座方尖碑上的象形文字和那些发疯囚犯的涂鸦很像，蕴含着足以撕裂行星的能量。行星的看守英勇地破坏了邪教徒的计划，也破坏了那座可怕的方尖碑。方尖碑没有爆炸，而是释放出炽热的热浪，方尖碑本身在热浪中熔化了，周围的一切也被烧成了灰烬，但维博斯六号星终于安全了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los líderes de la conspiración, los cultistas del Culto del Amanecer Final, están atrapados en las minas. Han rodeado un extraño xenobelisco oscuro, cubierto de glifos, intentando despertarlo de su letargo. Los glifos que contenía eran similares a los que dibujaban los convictos locos. La monstruosa construcción contenía energía suficiente para destrozar el planeta. Al desbaratar heroicamente el plan de los cultistas, los guardias han desarticulado la terrible máquina. En lugar de explotar, el obelisco emitió una ola de calor abrasador, derritiéndose y convirtiendo en cenizas a quienes lo rodeaban. Vheabos VI se había salvado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists from the Cult of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los líderes de la conspiración, los cultistas del Culto del Amanecer Final, están atrapados en las minas. Han rodeado un extraño xenobelisco oscuro, cubierto de glifos, intentando despertarlo de su letargo. Los glifos que contenía eran similares a los que dibujaban los convictos locos. La monstruosa construcción contenía energía suficiente para destrozar el planeta. Al desbaratar heroicamente el plan de los cultistas, los guardias han desarticulado la terrible máquina. En lugar de explotar, el obelisco emitió una ola de calor abrasador, derritiéndose y convirtiendo en cenizas a quienes lo rodeaban. Vheabos VI se había salvado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}陰謀のリーダーである最後の夜明け魔女団の信者たちが鉱山に閉じ込められている。彼らは、グリフで覆われた奇妙で暗いゼノ・オベリスクを取り囲み、眠りから覚醒させそうとしている。そこに描かれていたグリフは、狂った受刑者たちが描いていたものと似ていた。その巨大な建造物には、惑星を引き裂くのに十分なエネルギーがため込まれていた。魔女団の計画を勇ましい態度で阻止することで、護衛たちは恐ろしい機械を破壊した。オベリスクは爆発せずに、猛烈な熱波を発したため、それ自体が溶けだし、周囲の者を灰に変えた。ヴィアボス・VIは救われたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists from the Cult of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}陰謀のリーダーである最後の夜明け魔女団の信者たちが鉱山に閉じ込められている。彼らは、グリフで覆われた奇妙で暗いゼノ・オベリスクを取り囲み、眠りから覚醒させそうとしている。そこに描かれていたグリフは、狂った受刑者たちが描いていたものと似ていた。その巨大な建造物には、惑星を引き裂くのに十分なエネルギーがため込まれていた。魔女団の計画を勇ましい態度で阻止することで、護衛たちは恐ろしい機械を破壊した。オベリスクは爆発せずに、猛烈な熱波を発したため、それ自体が溶けだし、周囲の者を灰に変えた。ヴィアボス・VIは救われたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les chefs de la conspiration et les fanatiques du Culte de l'Aube finale se retrouvent acculés dans les mines, autour d'un étrange xéno-obélisque sombre couvert de glyphes, tentant de le tirer de son sommeil. Les glyphes en question sont similaires à ceux que dessinaient les détenus fous. Le monument monstrueux détient suffisamment d'énergie pour réduire la planète en charpie, mais en déjouant héroïquement les plans des fanatiques, les gardes empêchent la terrible machine d'exploser. Au lieu de cela, elle émet une puissante vague de chaleur qui la fait fondre et transforme en cendres tous ceux alentour. Vhéabos-VI est sauvée !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists from the Cult of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les chefs de la conspiration et les fanatiques du Culte de l'Aube finale se retrouvent acculés dans les mines, autour d'un étrange xéno-obélisque sombre couvert de glyphes, tentant de le tirer de son sommeil. Les glyphes en question sont similaires à ceux que dessinaient les détenus fous. Le monument monstrueux détient suffisamment d'énergie pour réduire la planète en charpie, mais en déjouant héroïquement les plans des fanatiques, les gardes empêchent la terrible machine d'exploser. Au lieu de cela, elle émet une puissante vague de chaleur qui la fait fondre et transforme en cendres tous ceux alentour. Vhéabos VI est sauvée !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Anführer der Verschwörung, die Kultisten vom Kult der letzten Dämmerung, waren in den Minen gefangen. Sie haben einen merkwürdigen, dunklen Xeno-Obelisken umzingelt, der von Glyphen bedeckt ist, und versuchen ihn aus seinem Schlaf zu wecken. Die Glyphen ähnelten denen auf den Zeichnungen der wahnsinnigen Sträflinge. Das monströse Gebilde enthielt genug Energie, um den ganzen Planeten zu zerreißen. Indem sie den Plan der Kultisten heldenhaft gestört haben, haben die Wachen die schreckliche Maschine besiegt. Anstatt zu explodieren, strahlte der Obelisk eine gleißende Hitzewelle aus, durch die er sich selbst zum Schmelzen brachte und alle in seiner Umgebung einäscherte. Vheabos-VI war gerettet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The leaders of conspiracy, the cultists from the Cult of the Final Dawn, are trapped in the mines. They have surrounded a strange dark xeno-obelisk, covered with glyphs, trying to awaken it from its slumber. The glyphs on it were similar to those that the mad convicts were drawing. The monstrous construction contained enough energy to tear the planet apart. By heroically disrupting the cultists' plan, the guards have disrupted the terrible machine. Instead of exploding, the obelisk emitted a blistering heatwave, melting itself and turning those around it to ash. Vheabos VI had been saved.{/n}
